trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **Navigating** event.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a **Navigating** esemény.

trans-unit.source: These event arguments contain information about the navigation that was requested, and are passed to handlers of the **Navigating** event, which is implemented by the following: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> NavigatingCancelEventArgs encapsulates the following details of the navigation request: - **Navigation Initiation**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ezek az eseményargumentumok információkkal szolgálnak a kért, amely a kezelők számára átadott navigációs a **Navigating** esemény, amelyet a következő:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>NavigatingCancelEventArgs magában foglalja a navigációs kérelem a következő adatokat:- **navigációs kezdeményezés**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation Content**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigációs tartalom**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation Request**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigációs kérelem**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.WebRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation State**: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.TargetContentState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This information allows you to both evaluate the nature of the navigation request, and view and update specified request details before navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ezt az információt lehetővé teszi, hogy mind a navigációs kérelem jellege értékelését és megtekintése és megadott kérelem részleteinek frissítése előtt navigációs következik be.

trans-unit.source: Based on the navigation request information provided by NavigatingCancelEventArgs, or based on application-specific state or code, you can completely prevent navigation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` (by default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`).
trans-unit.target: A navigációs alkalmazáskérelem adatai NavigatingCancelEventArgs által biztosított, vagy az alkalmazás-specifikus állapot vagy a kód alapján alapján, teljesen megakadályozhatja navigációs úgy, hogy a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>tulajdonságot `true` (alapértelmezés szerint <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>van `false`).</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lekér egy hivatkozást a tartalom objektum, amely van folyamatban nyílik meg.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Tartalom segítségével léphet egy [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] vagy objektumot.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an object, which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Content contains a reference to the content object that is being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Egy objektum, amely akkor fordul elő, amikor a program meghívja lépéskor <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>és <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, tartalom a tartalom objektum, amely van folyamatban nyílik meg hivatkozást tartalmaz.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Emellett a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>tulajdonság lesz `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> reference to the content object that is being navigated to; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>, amely az; ellenkező esetben van folyamatban nyílik a tartalom objektum hivatkozását <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objektum, amely társítva van a háttérben navigációs az éppen másik oldalon tartozó Feladatelőzmény-bejegyzést.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is raised when navigating from one piece of content to another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>esemény jelenik meg, ha a tartalom egy részét a másik útvonalon.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: The content that is being navigated from is added to back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom van folyamatban másik biztonsági előzménylistáján kerül.

trans-unit.source: You can set ContentStateToSave with a custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object to associate state information with content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Az egyéni ContentStateToSave állíthatja be <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objektum állapotadatokat társítandó tartalom előzménylistáján.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is associated with the back navigation history entry for the page being navigated from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objektum, amely társítva van a háttérben navigációs az éppen másik oldalon tartozó Feladatelőzmény-bejegyzést.

trans-unit.source: Gets the optional data <xref:System.Object> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a választható adatok <xref:System.Object>navigációs indításakor átadott.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ExtraData can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation.
trans-unit.target: ExtraData segítségével adjon át egy adott navigációs adott környezetben vonatkozó adatokat.

trans-unit.source: ExtraData contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ExtraData az objektum <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>vagy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> meghívásakor második argumentumként átadott mutató hivatkozást tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Egyéb esetben `null`.

trans-unit.source: The optional data <xref:System.Object> that was passed when navigation started.
trans-unit.target: A választható adatok <xref:System.Object>navigációs indításakor átadott.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the navigator (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>) that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> is servicing this navigation, or whether a parent navigator is doing so.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy a Navigátor (<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>) által meghatározott <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>szolgál ki a navigációs, vagy hogy egy fölérendelt navigator tesz a lehetséges.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigator that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> is servicing this navigation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>érték, amely <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Ha a navigátor által megadott <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*>szolgál ki a navigációs.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Navigator*> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is returned, such as during a nested <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> navigation.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ad vissza, például mert közben egy beágyazott <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> navigációs.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> érték, amely jelzi, amely végbemegy navigációs típusú.

trans-unit.source: The types of navigation that can occur are: - Navigating to new content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: A következő típusú navigációs, amik akkor léphetnek fel: - navigációs új tartalmakhoz (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Navigating to the previous item in back navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -Lépjen vissza az előző elem előzménylistáján (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Navigating to the next item in forward navigation history (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -Navigáljon a következő elem előre előzménylistáján (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: - Refreshing existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).
trans-unit.target: -A meglévő tartalom frissítése (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> érték, amely jelzi, amely végbemegy navigációs típusú.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: A Navigátor kiváltott esemény.

trans-unit.source: While Navigator stores a reference to the navigator that raised this event, the navigator may not have actually initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: Navigator tárolja a Navigátor ezt az eseményt létrehozó egy hivatkozást, amíg a Navigátor előfordulhat, hogy nem ténylegesen kezdeményezett a navigáció.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether this navigator did initiate the current navigation, inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Annak megállapításához, hogy ehhez a navigátorhoz kezdeményezte az aktuális navigációs, vizsgálja meg a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsNavigationInitiator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the navigator that raised this event
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Object>Ez azt jelenti, hogy az eseményt váltotta ki navigator</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> nyílik meg, hogy a tartalom alkalmazni kívánt objektumot.

trans-unit.source: TargetContentState will contain a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object if navigating to content in back or forward navigation history that has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: TargetContentState fogja tartalmazni, egy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objektumot, hogy lépjen vissza a tartalom vagy előzménylistáján továbbítja, amely rendelkezik egy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objektum társítva.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that is to be applied to the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> nyílik meg, hogy a tartalom alkalmazni kívánt objektumot.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] nyílik meg, hogy a tartalomhoz.

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to content using either an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] or an object.
trans-unit.target: Tartalom segítségével léphet egy [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] vagy objektumot.

trans-unit.source: When navigating to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], which occurs when calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, Uri contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Megnyitásakor egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], amely akkor fordul elő, meghívásakor <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>és <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, URI-azonosító tartalmazza a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] nyílik meg, hogy a tartalom.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Emellett a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>tulajdonság lesz `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> for the content being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>nyílik meg, hogy a tartalomhoz.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If navigating to an object, Uri is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navigálás objektumra, hogy van-e a Uri <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objektum, amely a megadott tartalom kérésére szolgál.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> is an abstract base class that encapsulates a Web request, and is protocol agnostic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>egy absztrakt alaposztályból, amely magában foglalja a webes kérelem, és független a protokoll.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> and extends it with protocol specific state and behavior, including: - <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes közös protokollhoz a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] tartalmazza abból származó osztály <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>és kiterjesztik az adott állapotú protokoll és viselkedését, többek között:- <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] használó a `pack://` sémát, és kérjen az alkalmazás (lásd: [WPF-alkalmazás erőforrás, a tartalom és az adatfájlokat](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] használó a `http://` sémát, a kérelmek fájljait és a webkiszolgálók.</xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] használó a `ftp://` sémát, a kérelmek fájljait és FTP-kiszolgálóról.</xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] használó a `file://` sémát, amely a helyi fájlokat kér.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can both view and modify <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> details.
trans-unit.target: Akkor is megtekinthetők és módosíthatók <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>részleteit.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: WebRequest is `null` when navigation occurs by: - Using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: WebRequest van `null` navigációs által esetén: - használatával a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.WebBrowser>

trans-unit.source: - Calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> - Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -Hívása <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> beállítása</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Navigating through HTML content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> HTML-tartalmakat navigál

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to request the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest?displayProperty=fullName> objektum, amely a megadott tartalom kérésére szolgál.
